WebResource.Name: tc_/Core/Events.js
WebResource.Description:
The following was created by John Resig (Creator of jQuery library) to address IE's improperly functioning addEventListener.
addEvent() in: obj - The DOM element to add an event to type - The type of event (ex. 'click') fn - The function to attach
removeEvent() in: obj - The DOM element to remove the event from type - The type of event (ex. 'click') fn - The function to be removed
